profile.title: Boemo ba Mosebelisi
profile.mustLogin: O tlameha ho kena ho bona litlhophiso.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Bontša molaetsa oa pele le o fetotsoeng
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Metsotsoana ho fihlela e hlakoloa ka bo eona
profile.saveError: Phoso: Ha e khone ho boloka litlhophiso.
profile.noPrivateKey: Ha ho senotlolo sa lekunutu sesebelisoa sena.
profile.setBackupPassword: Beha phasewete ho sireletsa bekapo ea hau:
profile.exportFailed: Ho hlolehile ho romela senotlolo kantle
profile.enterBackupPassword: Kenya phasewete bakeng sa bekapo ena:
profile.importSuccess: Senotlolo sa lekunutu se kentsoe sesebelisoa sena.
profile.importFailed: Ho hlolehile ho kenya (phasewete e fosahetseng kapa faele e senyehileng).
profile.keysRotated: Senotlolo se secha se entsoe, 'me senotlolo sa sechaba se kentsoe.
profile.importKey: Kenya bekapo e sirelelitsoeng ea senotlolo
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlolo sa hau sa lekunutu ha se tlohe sesebelisoa sena. Romela kopi e sirelelitsoeng ka phasewete ho e khutlisetsa sesebelisoa se seng.
profile.themeFreeNotice: U sebelisa mofuta oa mahala — sebelisa likhetho tse potlakileng tsa Letsatsi/Khoeli ka tlaase. Ntlafatsa ho bula lihlooho tse ling.
profile.backupTitle: Libekapo tse sirelelitsoeng le ho hokahanya lisebelisoa
profile.backupDesc: Etsa libekapo tse sirelelitsoeng ka phasewete bakeng sa linotlolo tsa hau, 'me u li khutlisetse sesebelisoa se seng ho sinkron.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Fifatsa ha sesebelisoa se sa sebetse
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ntlahisetse haeba molaetsa oa ka o kopitsoa
profile.unfollowFailed: Ho hlolehile ho khaotsa ho latela
profile.followHint: Lipale tsa bona li tla hlaha feedeng ea hao ea Balateli haeba ba li phatlalatsa e le Balateli kapa Sechaba.
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: Ho hlolehile ho jarolla karolo ena
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ho na le phoso karolong ena.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetisetsa mehala le melaetsa e kenang ho nomoro kapa lengolo-tsoibila le netefalitsoeng. Mehala/melaetsa e tsoang ho uena e ka bontša nomoro ea hau ea Chatforia.
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Nomoro ea mohala oa moo bakeng sa mehala (E.164)

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha molaetsa kapa kamore ea puisano ho qala ho qoqa
